english_example_sentence: The young student is a person who reads a new book every evening.
russian_example_sentence: Молодой студент — это человек, который читает новую книгу каждый вечер.
turkish_example_sentence: Genç öğrenci, her akşam yeni bir kitap okuyan kişidir.
